name: OLD CITY MIRROR
description:
Mystery warehouse story. Walk around the block and go inside for a surprise. Made w/ love in Baltimore, MD by Max Anderson 3 aka "the Wind Spirit" for Haunted PS1 Summer of Screams Jam.  Music supplied by the very talented and generous M. Triplett. Could not be possible without continuous walks and discussions with Kodi Frabricant aka All Purpose Chaos Forever who discovered and christened Fashion Box.

Other Jam Entries: https://itch.io/jam/haunted-ps1-summer-spooks/entries

Please bear in mind this is "my first game" so please be kind when encountering anything "bad" or "broken".

THANBKS!!
